title: Spurious (?) error in "compile-fail\rfc-2126-extern-in-paths\single-segment.rs" etc

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-spurious
labels.description: Area: Spurious failures in builds (spuriously == for no apparent reason)

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

body:
First introduced by https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/47828#issuecomment-364319910.

Symptom: The following 3 test cases involving error E0432 will fail. 

```
failures:
    [compile-fail] compile-fail\rfc-2126-extern-in-paths\single-segment.rs
    [compile-fail] compile-fail\use-keyword.rs
    [compile-fail] compile-fail\use-mod-2.rs
```

Mainly affects Windows and macOS machines (maybe because they are tested first).

Current instances:

| PR | Image |
|----|-------|
| https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/47828#issuecomment-363678879 | [check i686-pc-windows-gnu](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/rust-lang/rust/build/1.0.6263/job/74yea2qqd4fyjexh) |
| https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/47828#issuecomment-363936811 | [check x86_64-apple-darwin](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/338698482) |
| https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/47828#issuecomment-364316073 | [check i686-pc-windows-gnu](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/rust-lang/rust/build/1.0.6280/job/qf0j6abuio645if4) |
| https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/47657#issuecomment-364632724 | [check i686-pc-windows-gnu](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/rust-lang/rust/build/1.0.6293/job/k1wbokf5c59o4ghj) |
| https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/48092#issuecomment-364678367 | [check i686-pc-windows-gnu](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/rust-lang/rust/build/1.0.6297/job/6nootmnfocnykqv2) |

| https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/47804#issuecomment-364805485 | [check x86_64-apple-darwin](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/340272334) |
